entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Hawkesbury Airport 09:16 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.5°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -6.5°C
Wind: E 22 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Snow or ice pellets. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning then changing to ice pellets then changing to rain this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early this afternoon. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023
